thread.title: Alentejo Pig Fair

author: agenda.visit@turismodeportugal.pt
title: Alentejo Pig Fair
text:
Alentejo Pig Fair
Alentejo Pig Fair
Events
The Alentejo Pig Fair is a mark of identity of the rural world of this region, reflecting the knowledge, flavors and skills of women and men who transform the potential of the land.
In 2025, the XVII edition of the largest event in Ourique, Capital of the Alentejo Pig, returns on the 21st, 22nd and 23rd of March, in an event that promises to be unique and memorable. Celebrate gastronomy, tradition, identity, with lots of musical entertainment and a vibrant spirit of a party that attracts thousands of visitors from the region and the country.
